alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; St. Clair; Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 2:44PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Talladega, southwestern Calhoun and east central St. Clair Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 244 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Honda Manufacturing Of Alabama, or 11 miles east of Pell City, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Talladega, Pell City, Lincoln, Riverside, Munford, Talladega Superspeedway, Honda Manufacturing Of Alabama, Bynum, Talladega Municipal Airport, Logan Martin Lake, Anniston Army Depot, Eastaboga, Jackson Shoals, Howells Cove and St. Clair County Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
